RTRCmdLineString Class Reference

Detailed Description

Descendant of RTRCmdLineArg which provides type checking. Strings provide cast operator to RTRString. 

     int main(int argc, char **argv)
     {
         RTRCmdLineString string("config", "file_name", "load the given file", "default");
   
        //resolve and check command line
   
         RTRString &value = string;
   
        //...
